name: Dice-orz
description:
Dice-orz is a puzzle game about trying to orient dice! This game was made for the GMTK 2022 game jam around the theme "Roll of the Dice". The game takes heavy inspiration from the 2007 flash game, Bloxorz. 

The future of this game is unknown; however, feedback is greatly appreciated and if the game gains a bit of traction I will revisit it!

Credits:

Bryan Huke: Programming, Level Design, Game Design

Madisen Ingalls: 3D modeling, Texturing

Sam Curtice: Music, SFX

Additional Help:

Silas Wunder: SFX

Skybox Asset Pack Used: Skybox Series Free
